title: Crossing Lines
description: Whether it was pure misunderstanding or something much darker we’ll never know, but a hypothetical from Jay caused an eruption on The Bonfire.  Inspired by actor and diet icon Peter Deluise, Jay and Dan are on Day One of their Slim Fast Diet and things are off to a rocky start. Dan and Jay plan for death.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
